title: Poppy VU fanart

embed.description: I hope the hero likes me.Fanart of Poppy from League of Legends. I love her VU so much <3

body:
"I hope the hero likes me."
I LOVE NEW POPPY! <3 SHE'S SO PRECIOUS~

replies.body:
{{champion:78}}: "Hey! I got your hammer ready and shiny!"

{{champion:126}}: "Well.. this is awkward... I.. erm.. already built mine"

{{champion:78}}  D:

Funny thing is... Poppy is the Hammer Hero.. she is just too SHORTsighted to see it!
*kills self*

Back on topic though,, I am going to become this artists number 1 fan. I absolutly love the style they use.

Ahh! Thank you very much! <3 If you'd like I have an old Forecast Janna blog you can check out c: It's got a lot of my art and humor. Right over here~ http://ask-a-trustworthy-weather-woman.tumblr.com/
Favorited that link. I am now officially stalking your art.  No need to worry though I swear no harm will come to it. Just a lot of admiration.
